      Economic news in Kaluga

      How do you make millions without holding millions of oil and multi-ton gold deposits? It seems impossible. However, in a short period of time, the Kaluz province managed to escape from a third-party entity to the polyder regions. What a miracle.Kaluga- hand trap or ordinary magic - we don't try. Starts open, jobs are created, and there is no revenue to the budget. It's not a problem that external debt is growing, sales are falling, and production is declining. Will we survive another crisis? How to create a deficit budget without reducing the cost of “social”? Where do you get the money for an endless road repair? What kind of spoons do you have to attract a generous investor? How much is the mid-statistical caluvian and why is he spending half his salary on the comm? Why is there only two grams of oil in the food basket? And finally, where do taxpayers go? Socking answers to these and many other questions you will find under "Kaluga economy"
